wikipedia_page.main: Charles Robert Worthington (28 February 1877 – 7 December 1950) was an English first-class cricketer active 1898 who played for Kent. He was born in Surbiton; died in Victoria, British Columbia.

response: Gary Rhodes OBE, Charles Worthington , and Kamal Basran.
